website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight self-tanner provides a nice tan without clogging pores.
pros: This lightweight gel doesn't stain skin
It provides a deep, summery color
Gel formula spreads evenly over skin, so no splotches
Container holds a large amount of product
cons: Mostly synthetic materials that can irritate sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: I think I see some color
customer_reviews.text: I give this a four, it works great on my two friends who can tan. I am very fair skinned with little ability to tan. I applied this to my face 5 times, just for my friend to say, I think I see some color. I did put on my legs and it worked, and lasted for days. One of my friends is fare skinned, but tans naturally and the other is friend it Japanese and Caucasian. They both get great color from this product.
customer_reviews.author: VALARIE

customer_reviews.title: This product always give me a natural brown without the ...
customer_reviews.text: This product always give me a natural brown without the orange tone. I wish the department stores would still carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Robertson

customer_reviews.title: still smells
customer_reviews.text: Why does this have to smel like you've been self tanning? It still reeks of coconut. Otherwise the product does an OK job per wife who used it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: As a former Tanning bed person, I wanted to start going the healthy way of tanning so I researched for a long time to find something that was not streaky and would give me some good color. I finally found Shiseido and went with it because out of all of the self-tanners, this had the best reviews. I exfoliated and did everything right. I was actually very calculating with my application- the next day, streaks. I decided to do it again that evening to hopefully fill in the gaps. It just made it worse. I am not sure what the solution is out there, but this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: Arner Adventures

customer_reviews.title: Strictly for self tanning: does it even  work? Who knows, I don’t.
customer_reviews.text: I actually used to sell Shiseido as a counte-manager in a mall department store. This product was not gentle and burned my skin. I suspect because it was a gel.
customer_reviews.author: Convertible Girl

customer_reviews.title: Works but smells
customer_reviews.text: Works well give me a great glow but hate the smell of it
customer_reviews.author: michelle b.

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I've Been using this product for years and love the quality and the price. Even tan and easy to apply. Great for us pale folk that want natural looking color.
customer_reviews.author: flyaway217

customer_reviews.title: A pleasure to use
customer_reviews.text: Self-tanning products are a secret obsession of mine. One peek in my bathroom cabinets will make that clear to anyone. The gels of recent years have been especially good, and Shiseido's Brilliant Bronze Self-Tanning Gel stands out among all of them. It goes on smoothly, absorbs quickly without that unpleasant sticky period, and produces a lovely bronze glow that's heightened after two or three days of repeat applications. Like all bronzing products, there's an less attractive phase if you stop to use the product, but a single re-application makes it all good again. The price is pretty typical, but here you're paying for one of the finest bronzing gels you can get.
customer_reviews.author: K. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: I am in LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I am in LOVE with this self tanner. Not only does it go on incredibly even and smooth, it has a really nice scent and gives an immediate hint of color. The color it develops into really looks natural--as though you have been in the sun. Yes, it is expensive, but I find most of the good tanners are. It doesn't stain your hands like some mousses do. This and "Bombshell" brand tanner are my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda N. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: If I could give it zero stars I would
customer_reviews.text: Worst self tanner I have ever tried in my life, and also the most expensive. It does not work AT ALL. I have applied this every day for 3 days and got no color at all. You would do better with something from the drugstore. What a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F.
